  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BatteriesCI, BatteriesImplementationI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.OutboundPortI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.PortI, java.io.Serializable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class BatteriesOutboundPort
extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.ports.AbstractOutboundPort
implements BatteriesCI
    The class BatteriesOutboundPort implements an outbound port for the BatteriesCI component interface.

    Description

    Implementation Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant

    Invariants

     invariant       true        // no more invariant
